data.title: Decode me
data.statement:
You must output the decoded variant of an encoded message.

An encoded [[message]] is comprised of characters in their ASCII form with the exception of the space character which is used to separate each ASCII value from the next.

The ASCII value {{32}} is used to separate each word from the next. It is to be converted to its character form and included in the decoded message. In addition to that, each word has its character order reversed.

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testOut: You're going to like the next test case (like, really like). Best of luck! :)

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testOut: ): !kcul fo tseB .)ekil yllaer ,ekil( esac tset txen eht ekil ot gniog er'uoY

data.constraints: [[message]] is a string containing space-separated integers, where 32 <= each integer <= 126
data.inputDescription: A string [[message]] that contains the encoded message.
data.outputDescription: A single line containing the decoded message.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You must output the decoded variant of an encoded message.

An encoded message is comprised of characters in their ASCII form with the exception of the space character which is used to separate each ASCII value from the next.

The ASCII value 32 is used to separate each word from the next. It is to be converted to its character form and included in the decoded message. In addition to that, each word has its character order reversed.
Input
A string message that contains the encoded message.
Output
A single line containing the decoded message.
Constraints
message is a string containing space-separated integers, where 32 <= each integer <= 126
Example
Input
111 108 108 101 72 32 101 114 101 104 116 32 41 58
Output
Hello there :)
